title: I'm glad I purchased this phone over Redmi Note 4.
Since then it has been a joy ride with this gadget
WATCH THIS UNBOXING BEFORE YOU BUY
After sales support are not professional
You'll regret if you don't buy it for yourself!!!
ITS REALLY GOOD..
One of the best smart phones in this price segment,
Very nice mobile phone
Awesome mobile
EVERYONE MUST BUY IT.
review:
I was pretty much confused over which device to buy between Redmi note 4 and
Honor 6x. After a lot of research and thinking, I took a risk and bought this
one and now I didn't have to regret over my decision as this phone is a
complete all rounder and far better than note 4 in many terms.  
Some people were crying over the low performance CPU and GPU this phone is
having but trust me guys, I personally tested almost all the high end games
like modern Combat 5, NOVA 3 and asphalt 8 and they didn't lag at all.
Multitasking and ram management is awesome.  
#Camera is said to be the key feature of this device and I can now accept that
fact after trying it for over a week. Both the cameras did great job in
outdoor and indoor artificial lighting conditions.  
Now, let's move to the battery part, this smartphone comes with 3350 mAh
battery which is great in terms of daily usage and can easily last for about 1
complete day with moderate use including 2 hours of gaming.  
Fingerprint sensor is astonishingly fast, just takes 0.3 seconds to recognize
the fingertips, which is damn fast as compared to note 4.  
I personally recommend everyone to buy this smartphone, since the battery
backup is slightly lower than redmi note 4 but still 3350 mAh isn't bad. And
I've seen some camera comparisons of both the phones and Note 4 has got really
poor camera quality and no where near Honor 6x. Plus u should hear the #noise
which Note 4 captures while recording videos.. 😂😂😂  
  
Folks be smart and don't get carried away with the Note 4 just for a few extra
hours of battery backup. Trust me, you won't regret buying this smartphone.

I bought this phone for Rs. 13,000 in Amazon Big Sale in the month of May.
Since then it has been a joy ride with this gadget. Throw any parameter for
buying a mid range smartphone and you will find this one is there.  
  
Processor+RAM - Enough to handle daily work and heavy graphics. Videos played
are crisp and without any lag.  
  
Body - It has got a Metal Body which looks premium.  
  
Screen - 5.5" screen is vibrant in colour with 2.5D curved glass. There is a
screen coating from company which is already pasted on screen.  
  
Battery - I am a very heavy user with WiFi, Data, Video, Instagram,
Facebook..., hence I get one full day juice. User experience may vary.  
  
Sound - Is decent but not very high. No headphones in the bundle.  
  
Camera - Main 12 mp IMX386 sensor takes beautiful images. The 2 mp monochrome
sensor helps creating Bokeh effects. Twin camera is good setup on this phone.
Selfie Camera is good but without 'Beauty Mode' it gives good photos. Some
photo samples are added here.  
  
Updates - Phone came with Marshmallow and updated to Nougat in June. Oreo
update is lined up for January 2018.  
  
Service - Huawei has service centers in major cities in India. So far have not
got any problem with phone, so cannot comment on that.  
  
Price - At 14,000, its a best deal you can get any time.



 My mom's been using it for a few days after her Asus zenphone max(2gb ram)
was run over by a swift.  
She says the zenphone has better internet connectivity but the Honor 6x is
faster(3 GB ram).  
  
I did an unboxing video + a quick setting up video.  
  
I apologize for the bad video quality :/

I had a very good impression for the phone during the initial days. when my
phone display got shattered and went for service through one assist they took
almost 15 days. when i received the phone the phone was fine with a display.
but then the problems started.  
1\. Touch Issue  
2\. Contacts got shattered and merged with others.  
3\. When i touch a contact or type a alphabet it takes atleast 15-20 times
touch. When i touch some contact call get connected with some other contact  
4\. Volume of phone has gone down  
When i approached the service center in Coimbatore the reply is for any
warranty phone they need to send the phone to Chennai for service and needs 15
Days. I Couldn't able to understand the concept of Authorized Service Center.

I've just been using it for 4 days. So far it's been working great. RAM
management is super. The quality of the phone is superior. I got it for 8K in
GreatIndian Sale in January 2018. Thanks to Amazon for such a great a phone
I've been looking to buy for long time.

AFTER USING IT FOR 4 MONTH I CAME TO A CONCLUSION THAT ITS DECENT PHONE AT
VERY DECENT PRICE.  
  
DESIGN: ITS REALLY GOOD...BETTER AND SLIMMER THAN REDMI NOTE 4 AND ALL ITS
CONTEMPRORIES.  
  
PERFORMANCE: ITS EQUIVALANT TO SNAP DRAGON 625 ...WITH 4 GB VARIANT ITS
FLAWLESS BUT WHILE USING 4K VEDIOS AND  
VERY HIGH RAM GAMES IT HAS SLUGGISHNESS. BUT SAME WITH REDMI NOTE 4.  
CAMERA: MANY THING WERE TOLD ABOUT CAMERA...CAMERA IS AWESOME, EVEN AT LOW
LIGHT CONDITIONS.IT HAS EXCELLANT  
SHARPNESS AND VERY GOOD FOCUS  
BATTERY: ITS A SETBACK...NO FAST CHARGING NO TWO DAY SUPPORT....BATTERY IS
JUST ABOVE AVERAGE.BUT END WITH THE  
DAY...APPROX 20 HRS WITH MEDIUM USE.  
PRICE: I GOT IT IN LIGHTENING DEAL... SO BEST DEAL UNDER 10K  
  
IT HAS NO HEATING ISSUES...KIRIN IS GOOD  
  
NETWORK...AVERAGE...WORK FINE WITH JIO...SOME HAS SAID 2ND SIM IS ONLY
2G...ITS NOT TRUE...NEEDNOT TO CHANGE THE SLOT  
FOR 4G...RATHER CHANGE PRIORITY  
SOUND IS LOW...YES ITS A SETBACK  
  
OVERALL WHAT MORE U NEED IN PHONES BELOW 10K....

Directly coming to the point after 3 months of usage  
Pros  
1- good processor, normal gaming is smooth without heating issue, can play
without a pause. Kirin655 works great.  
2- battery backup is good. 3340 mAh last for a day. Don't expect extraordinary
backup.  
3- display is good, compared with my bros iPhone 6s display, colour production
is pretty comparable.  
4-it has default process management feature, no need to install 3rd party app.  
5-coming to 📷, it is pretty good, takes very vivid pictures with good
colour(compare to mi A1 it takes more clear pics), it will not disappoint you
but not as much as it has been exaggerated.  
  
Cons  
1- design- bottom bezel is thick  
2-hangs if you open too many apps like every other phone, ram management
doesn't handels this.  
3-sometimes aaps hangs, need to restart the app.  
4- on screen button has some +ve n -ve points, but it should be off screen.
+Ve - we can rearrange and add 4th option of drawing notification bar.  
-ve - always need to swipe up when u need these buttons.  
  
Cons are very normal so we can ignore them.  
  
PS. Value for money

Pros:  
1\. Good internal memory capacity. Out of 64 GB, one gets around 53 GB.  
2\. Processor is fast. No Lags till now.  
3\. Rear cameras work quite well. Dual camera feature.  
4\. Customized UI gives a totally different experience. Nice one.  
  
Cons:  
1\. No dedicated slot for memory card. Hybrid SIM slot.  
2\. Front camera not upto the mark. Poor Selfie quality.  
3\. Had issues with Jio calls, but got rectified with update.  
4\. No fast charging. Takes about 2 hours to get fully charged from 15%.  
  
Overall a good phone with enough internal memory, good dual rear end cameras,
good processor. If one compares with Redmi or Motorola, Redmi costs cheaper
with same features, but the camera quality of Redmi isn't that good. Also it
is quite difficult to get a hand on Redmi due to flash sale concept. Motorola
has good options but at a higher price. Advantage of Moto G series is quick
charging and dedicated memory slot, except that I believe no added features.
Till now used it for 2 months, haven't got any issues with the phone. Also
regular system updates are quite handy, got mine updated to Nougat.

Before this,i was found of motog fan, as i get the fatest update of android
version also the simple and nice look. But after using Honor 6x 64GB since 3
days i am really impressed with its performance. No heating issues, Gaming
superb, sound quality nice, not too loud. Camera quality is far better than
Moto in this price range. I got this phone at 10k. So as of now giving 5 star.

This is simply amazing for a phone of this price range
review:
Ordered one for my sister. She has been using the device since 5 months. No
flaws nothing. The device feels great in hand and user experience is just
excellent. Cameras are also good. Can tell honestly they are much better than
Redmi Note 4 camera (I've seen some pics taken by Redmi Note 4). Battery
though not big on paper but it remains a full day of moderate usage and also
carries for next day's quarter. After Nougat update the phone has been even
snappier. Over all a great value for money device. My personal opinion is its
better than Redmi note 4. (at the end of the day both are Chinese brands
nonetheless)

UPDATED:  
*Usage Review after 1 Month*  
  
My previous phone - Lenovo Vibe K5.  
  
This phone is the best bet if you are considering the following:  
1\. Solid Build  
2\. Dual Camera  
3\. Octa-Core with 4GB/64 GB combo  
4\. Good Display  
5\. High on Memory Management efficiency(*Speed/Response test) - Easily beats
Lenovo K8, MI 4 by 21 seconds and 14 seconds respectively*  
6\. Don't need an Iron-Box feel when you're using a SMART-Phone  
7\. Decent Battery with 1.5 Days (4G + Browsing, Whatsapp, Gaming)  
8\. Budget is below 15k  
  
Now to my experience of both Pros-Cons  
**Pros**  
As I had listed above, phone is very smooth, with beautiful UI & Memory
management. Camera is legendary for this price segment (*Thanks to Dual cam)
Front cam is very good too.  
  
I am not an avid gamer over phone, but still I do have my own set of games :
Sim City, Cricket 2016, Plague Inc., Assassin's Creed - And be happy that the
phone doesn't lag & heat!  
  
Now comes few cons:  
Fingerprint is not as fast as 0.3 seconds as they claim, it takes 2 shots to
recognize. And wetty fingers doesn't add good points to that.  
Gyroscope isn't good, so guaranteed you will not have a good VR experience. I
am still fond of TheatreMax of my old Lenovo.  
  
But.... You cant ask more off this little beast. My first Android phone was in
2011 - Huwaei Ideos, since then I had experimented with a lot of buggers..
Asus, iPhone 5C, MI, Lenovo. & My decision to go back to Huawei has paid me
rich dividends.  
  
Huawei is the best in build is what I could say from my experience.  
  
-Hope this review helps!  
  
*And Thanks Amazon for a 16 hour Delivery!  
  
UPDATE:  
Software:  
The phone is still a beast in every aspect with two software updates to the
accommodate the latest Android version on your device.  
  
Heating Issue:  
Heating?? What's that? Have installedPES2017, WWE2k17 and no lags at all and
it doesn't get heated so much ! For me... Thats a WOOWWW Moment having been
used to Lenovo previously.  
  
Memory Management & Swiftness  
As I said, Dont bother running heavy apps! Honor memory management is a jaw
dropping feature it manages processors smooth and no lags at all!  
  
One thing I hate -or-is hyped too much!  
The Fingerprint sensor.... It isnt that great! It takes 2-3 times for it to
recognize! Which gets me pissed off! But it is super fast in unlocking though!  
  
Camera -  
Back - Dual is a boon ! Front is decent ... shall post few pics soon...
everythin I have taken is personal so far ! :-p Also, I guess this the only
phone to have Front cam panaroma in this price segment!... Just Awwwweeeesome!

Hello.  
This is probably the best smartphone in the budget range of Rs 12,000 to
15,000.  
  
We get :  
  
All day battery life  
Full HD display  
3 / 4 Gb of Ram  
32 / 64 Gb of storage  
Very good and capable cameras  
Neat design  
Intuitive and clean User interface  
Android Nougat ( after the update ) and Oreo update in January'18.  
Easy customization with themes and third party apps( available on Play store
).  
  
Therefore it can be concluded that Huawei Honor 6X is a very good mobile phone
in this price range and you will 100% love your new phone.  
  
Thanks for reading the review.

You wont get a better dual camera phone like honor 6x in this price range of
11000.  
Pros-  
good camera both rear and front.  
Full HD display so multi media experience will be great.  
You get latest Android version nougat.  
  
Cons.  
Kirin processor is not because the phone lags sometimes when you use
continously.

A phone must buy, EMUI is elegant and seamless to handle. No heating issues
unlike with smartphones with Qualcomm Snapdragon processing units.
Multitasking and Memory management is a blissful experience. KIRIN 655 lives
up to the reputation of the brand. I bought this phone to oversee the problems
that I was facing with Samsung note 4 and never regretted since its purchase.
Finally, battery life last up to 2 days on moderate use and camera too does
its job really well. Volte support for Jio sim is to provided and call quality
is excellent.

I am using this phone for around 2 weeks now, and I used Moto X Style, Mi4i
and iphone 4 in the recent past. H6X is a very good phone under 15k.  
Pros:  
1\. Very good back camera, it has many features including Bookeh effect
(blurring the background), DSLR features like lighting effect, taking pictures
in the pitch dark without even using the flash and so on.  
2\. The Front camera is also good in normal lighting condition but does not
have flash.  
3\. Battery back up is superb, would run a full day even with moderately heavy
usage (gaming, 4G, GPS, music, movies etc.) and charges also quickly.  
4\. The Kirin soc is very good, no lagging, no heating. I play COC, Boom
Beach, Kill Shot etc. pretty often and did not feel any heating issues.  
5\. The EMUI is very good and has lots of custmoisation option. Personally, I
feel it is somewhat better than Xiaomi's MIUI.  
6\. Display is good as well, as it is FHD. Decent sun-light readability and
night reading mode to reduce the blue lights.  
7\. Though the display is 5.5 inch, it is pretty much easier to use with one
hand. I can do it even with my short and fat Chimpz fingers. Also, the phone
is much slimmer.  
8\. It has 15 months warranty as against the usual 12 months by other
manufacturers.  
9\. The Finger Print Sensor is quite good and I am pretty satisfied with its
response.  
Cons:  
1\. The loud speakers are not that loud and clear. Though one can hear the
ring tones from another nearby room, but in a crowded place one may miss a
call or two. For music lovers, I guess with a good pair of head-phones, one
can overcome this issue.  
2\. The metallic body is bit slippery, especially in summer as the hand sweats
and the phone tends to slip from hand. I am using a back-cover to overcome
this.  
3\. The display is not Gorilla glass, so need to use tempered glass. The phone
is provided with a factory fitted tempered glass by the manufacturer but it is
prone to keep the finger marks so need to wipe every now and then.  
4\. There's a minute problem with the contact search option. Sometime, when I
try to search some contacts and try to type the name, it does not detect the
input. But, when I close the contact and reopen it again and search, it
reflects the name. Seems it is a software glitch which would eventually get
solved when they would provide SW update.  
  
This is what I feel of the Honor 6X after using it for more than 2 weeks and
truly I am loving it. What more one can expect at 14k.

It's a good product. Recieved on time. Good packaging and delivery.  
  
This phone is amazing feels good in hand. Gives a feel of iPhone. Very slim
and elegant in design. Working well. Camera quality is good. Gaming is also
very good. Overall really very satisfied. A good value for money 💰.

I had Honor 6 earlier. I had no issues except I had to change the battery
once. Since I fell in love with honor, I decided to go for it once again. I
got an exchange value of 3600 INR for my honor 6, thanks to Amazon and i
purchased honor 6x.  
  
honor 6x is a much improved version of honor 6 in all aspects except camera.
There was a lot of talk about honor 6x dual camera, but i didnt feel it to be
that great. In low lighting conditions, it produces similar pictures as honor
6, only the wide aperture and slow-mo features are nice additions.  
  
On the peformance part i faced no issues at all using EMUI 5 and Android N. I
wish honor 6x had a 5 inch version since 5.5 becomes little large for one hand
operation. Overall I am very much satisfied with it's Performance, Music and
Camera.

First time writing a review in Amazon, although i have been a customer for a
while.I am writing this after 8 months of purchase of the phone.I am
thoroughly impressed by the quality this phone offers.40 + pre installed apps
and the phone hardly hangs.The camera quality for this price range is an
overkill.Display and touch are elegant. Coming to what made me write this
review after 8 months was the fact that the phone was submerged in 2 feet
water ( for a few seconds) and yet all it suffered was a scrambled speaker and
a mist infested camera.The speaker and camera resumed to normal servi after
letting it dry out for a day.This is simply amazing for a phone of this price
range. This is getting something more than what you pay for.

Got it for my dad...he was happy with the phone but one day the phone fell

After using phone for one week..i struggled between redmi4 and honor6x ..Main
reason to buy this CAMERA ..becoz camera and battery are the most people's
requirements..go for pros and cons ...  
CONS-  
1.Biggest problem in this honor device is..Audio output..its not only the
volume but also audio output itself is baaaad..i am a audiophile..i thought to
correct it by equalizers but its a time waste ..so if u luv music u will get
hurt by the honor audio output..i have used senheiser/sony/skull candy ..but
honors audio output beats their excellency nd give u the horrible output  
2.next all are minor cons- some times glitches  
happen,hang one for 1or 2secnds when there is heavy functioning  
3.In camera in normal mode also..the more the clarity in the middle grids..the
more the blurr in the corners...corners are so blurred in the images..dnt knw
why ..  
4\. I just really dnt like the branding in front wasting so much space..  
5.let look into some NO - NO ir (infra red )facility + in redmi devices, No
double tap sensor, No fast charging its usb type B only ...dont use while
charging..back is metallic one so u will feel definitely heat .. after
charging remove the pin keep for 5-10 mints then use ..  
Now PROS Which u will like more  
1.BATTERY-..NEVER EXPECTED This from honor ..its a 3400 mah battery ...but it
can make ur whole day ..screen on time with mobile data like heavy usage -
easily u can get 13-14 hrs a day..for rest if ur a just popup visitor u can
last for 1nd half day easily... specifically should mention about the power
saving modes  
2 modes - power saving mode& ultra power saving mode -excellent ways for
battery life  
3.RAM management- u wnt believe this ..actually i got 3 gb ram one ..in my mi
tab when i open about 10 apps the ram will be about jst 100 mb left and phone
will be slow...but i was shocked with honor ...i nearly opened about 15
apps..its still gives 1.8gb freee..and when u open these apps they wont reload
also...this might be the main reason for such a long battery life also..i was
so impressed  
3.CAMERA- As u all knw it is at its best..best thing is front cam is so good
and in artificial light alsoit gives u the best output.. but dnt expect beyond
with this..its a 13mp cam only it cant make miracles in CLARITY but showcases
the pic in beautiful way ..up on zooming its all grain u get ..but its the
best camera i have used around 10k range..best for photography people  
Conclusion-BADLY needed batterylife and photography..go for it  
But if u luv music - think twice /thrice before buying it ..

review:
Amazing phone at this price. I bought it in Great indian sale and the product
was delivered just within 4 days.  
  
About the phone:  
It is amazing phone by honor. The blend of dual camera Kirin 655 octa core
processor and 4gb ram fits in and works perfectly although the software
installed was marshmallow 6.0 and i expected it to come with nougat installed
but its okay you can manually update the phone.  
The design and build quality is also good "Better then MI phones". It has 64gb
internal storage so you never run out of storage and the UI is also very good.

jack with headphones.. You can't even return this junk...Major problem is it's
build quality, Huawei has made this phone using low grade aluminum, whenever
you touch the phone you can hear squeky noise coming from the phone ,
specially from it's borders.. Huawei didn't even reveal what grade of aluminum
is used out of shame..one fall and this phone will be Dead..

also pretty fast. At this cost the camera functions are too damn cool. With a
steady hand or tripod the night mode is awesome and the star track too.  
Rest every things sets this phone way ahead from the rest at the same price
group.

review:
I am writing the review after 6 months.  
The advantages are following compared to other phones in same price category:  
1\. Battery backup is good.  
2.Design is very well- feels like premium phone.  
3.Processor is best- does not hang or stop the apps/process even you are
multitasking.  
4\. Supports OTG- even can attach 1 TB harddisk.  
5\. Dual camera is good- The wide apperature effects are too good.  
6\. The UI is different than the other manufacturer, thus it is able to
identify as different phone.  
The cons are following:  
1\. selfie camera is not good.  
2\. There is a lag of about 2-3 sec during camera when using flesh light.  
  
Over all, it is best option to buy as it is solid.

that was a steal deal. No device can provide such value for money. Stay tuned
to amazon for more such offers.

Ui is good but not as good As miui.

User experience is not best but good though.

All in all a true worthy device for your money.

Righting review after 1 month use, this is my 8th smartphone I am using, this
is best of all, do update to the latest version, There are so much features in
it. I have purchased it rs 10999/- and also i will get 15% cashback worth 1650
which is just equal to tempered glass+back cover+party to friends haha,
Overall best smartphone in this range, no hang issue, no heating issue, no
battery issue, very good touch .

Bought it during the Honor Official Sale on amazon and got it for 10k, decent
product for the price, better than the other alternatives, however it has its
share of flaws, like no fast charging, and the screen is not coated with
gorilla glass, so a tempered glass is a MUST, and preferably from a good
brand. Camera is okay, but the performance is amazing, Huawei is very good
with their updates, so I got the Nougat update the day I opened the box. The
EMUI from huawei is arguably the best custon skin for android, the only
downside is that there are tons of bloatware, but the plethora of features you
get from EMUI is alone a good enough reason to buy a honor(or huawei) device.

This phone ticks all boxes. Quick updates, Nougat and now Oreo incoming...
camera is insane, front display flash for the front camera is clearly a winner
feature, standby time is incredible and iPhone-ish.  
  
EMUI 5.0 update makes notifications stock-like which is slick. App drawer is
definitely good,but I put Nova Launcher instead for tap and swipe gestures.  
  
Battery backup is crazy , 7-8 hrs SOT.  
  
Display and camera are clearly the best under 20K, and legibility under
sunlight is one of the best for any smartphone despite being a midrange phone.
Not comparable to flagships, but much better than just "getting the job done".  
  
The manual pro mode for camera is a photographer's delight.  
  
CONS  
  
AUDIO. The headphone output is clear but weak. Can't power up mid and high end
earphones like Brainwavz M2s or AKGs but can run the cheap earbuds very well.  
  
The speaker is crazy loud in terms of ringtone but really bad in terms of
bass. You will be embarrassed in front of iPhone and Galaxy S people. Do not
show off by trying to play music with 6X, it is meant for camera, stereo video
recording prowess, display etc

I bought it after thorough comparison with Mi note4,Eluga ray700& Lenovo
K8note.By god's grace,I was right!Camera beyond Comparison,battery usage less
than50% up to evening!No heating issue.Upgraded to Nugat very next day.Go for
it Blindly.A lottery for 10999/_

But this problem is fixed when you have OTG cable and pendrive. As far as it

This phone is up to my expected as the price range. Camera is very good

I have been using this from around last 3 months, previously i was using motoG
Turbo and it is a lot better phone in terms of everything except the build
quality. screen get scratched easily and phone is bend from one side i don't
even realized when.  
  
-Camera  
It has a great camera in this price range and it offers a lot of shooting
modes, Portrait mode is just fine, i don't use it much but sometimes it gives
really good results. it even provides a pro mode but sadly no raw support, it
can shoot 1080 video with good audio pick up, it can shoot slow motion video
but it is bad. front camera and video quality is decent. overall the camera is
really good for the price and moreover the camera software rocks !!  
  
\- Battery  
One can expect a full day of battery life with heavy usage easily. if you are
a normal use it can last you about1.5 to 2 days. Very Happy with the battery
cause i never have to think about it for the whole day. it would have been
great to see the fast charging though.  
  
-Display  
Great Display with good color reproduction.  
  
-Performance  
I don't play games so i wont talk about gaming performance. Overall good
performance in day to day usage. but now i feel there is a bit of lag
sometimes after updating to emui 5.0, it happens rarely till now so, not much
worried about it.  
  
If you are a person who wants good camera phone in this price range with
decent battery life go for it. i chose it over redmi note 4 for camera.  
i wish it would have a better build quality, a bit loud n clear audio from
speakers and raw support in camera. Hope this helps.  
  
Thanks

review:
I have problem in calling from this phone. If I call to other phone it doesn't
connect the call. caller can't hear me but I can hear caller...It's really
serious defect in this phone. And I m really disappointed because I bought it
before 2 days

While I am very happy with the phone and its basic features, I have still not
fully explored the complete phone. It has been more than a month and a half
that I am using this and there is still a lot to do before I give it a
complete review.  
  
The things that I like the most:  
1\. Finger print sensor is very fast. Ensure that your finger is moisture free
- else you will need to do a double take  
2\. Good storage space  
3\. After the second update, free RAM is close to 2 GB almost all the time.  
4\. Though I am not a heavy user, just some browsing, videos, photos, flickr
streams and a bit of music other than lots of phone calls and whats app, I am
able to manage a battery life of 2 days, without running dry.  
5\. Charging takes close to 2 hours with my 2 years old Micromax charger which
is more than enough time I need to settle in to my morning rituals.  
6\. Good camera with Manual more for Photography and Video  
7\. Nice photo collection of wall papers and screen themes

have been researching for mobiles since one year and decided to go with Honor
6x. The is simply superb and no drawbacks till now. Camera is fantastic and
supports fast charging. Battery backup is awesome as its Kirin 655 processor
consumes less power to perform the tasks when compared to other processors.
People who looking to buy the mobile with good camera and battery can blindly
go for it. UI responsive is awesome..

This is my second honor 6x. Its been pleasure to use this mobile. Performance
is to good and the camera quality is at very best. The battery is also good it
last for almost one and a half day. The emui 5.0 is a good update and improves
some function. Overall its a worth buy at 13k.

I've been using this phonce since April still no issue... Camera is great
battery life is awesome.. Design is good  
One main con. regarding this phone is that it doesn't have any kind of
protection.. In just one fall from about 3 feet my screen shattered into a
million pieces

Using this amazing phone since last 1 day..  
First of all thanks to Amazon for really nice packing..  
It has very good display, very nice camera front and both.. very quick
fingerprint sensor..  
3 GB RAM nd 32 GB ROM is very nice..  
Battery life is pretty good.. and many more things to explore..  
Overall no one can give you these things in such low price..

Pros  
1\. Got in 15999 Rs.  
2\. Camera quality is ultimate due to dual camera in rear  
3\. 4GB/64GB version in 15999 Rs. Is best in this price range  
4\. Built quality is best . Premium looks.  
5\. Never hangs up in past 6 months use.My phone is loaded with 56 GB space,
but still none of the app crashes, never hangs up, gallery opens up in
fraction of second  
5\. Screen resolution is at par with SUPER AMOLED  
  
Cons  
1\. No cons till now . Used for more than 6 months

super specific for the price.  
working great .  
though there is many models in the market honor 6x has its place.

Excellent camera quality --- Both front & rear however the review is all for
looks, camera, speed & display etc but not for music output quality is NOT
GOOD AT ALL both earphone & loudspeaker.  
If you are interested in phone with real good music output, this wont be a
prime suggestion.
